verses.text: Nevertheless, \w there|strong="H3427"\w* \w will|strong="H5971"\w* \w be|strong="H5971"\w* \w no|strong="H7200"\w* \w more|strong="H1419"\w* \w gloom|strong="H6757"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w those|strong="H5921"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* distress. \w In|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* past \w He|strong="H5921"\w* humbled \w the|strong="H5921"\w* land \w of|strong="H3427"\w* Zebulun \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* land \w of|strong="H3427"\w* Naphtali, \w but|strong="H7200"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* future \w He|strong="H5921"\w* \w will|strong="H5971"\w* honor \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Way|strong="H1980"\w* \w of|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* Sea, \w beyond|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* Jordan, Galilee \w of|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w nations|strong="H5971"\w*:

\w The|strong="H6440"\w* \w people|strong="H1471"\w* walking \w in|strong="H6440"\w* darkness \w have|strong="H1471"\w* seen \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w great|strong="H1431"\w* light; \w on|strong="H6440"\w* those living \w in|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w land|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* shadow \w of|strong="H6440"\w* death, \w a|strong="H3068"\w* light \w has|strong="H1471"\w* dawned.\f + \fr 9:2 \ft Cited in Matthew 4:15–16\f*

\w You|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H3117"\w* enlarged \w the|strong="H3588"\w* nation \w and|strong="H3117"\w* increased \w its|strong="H3588"\w* joy. \w The|strong="H3588"\w* people rejoice \w before|strong="H3117"\w* \w You|strong="H3588"\w* \w as|strong="H3117"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* rejoice \w at|strong="H3117"\w* harvest \w time|strong="H3117"\w*, \w as|strong="H3117"\w* men rejoice \w in|strong="H3117"\w* dividing \w the|strong="H3588"\w* plunder.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w as|strong="H1961"\w* \w in|strong="H1556"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* day \w of|strong="H1818"\w* Midian \w You|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* shattered \w the|strong="H3605"\w* yoke \w of|strong="H1818"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* burden, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* bar across \w their|strong="H3605"\w* shoulders, \w and|strong="H1818"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* rod \w of|strong="H1818"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* oppressor.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w every|strong="H5414"\w* trampling boot \w of|strong="H1121"\w* battle \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w every|strong="H5414"\w* garment rolled \w in|strong="H5921"\w* blood \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* burned \w as|strong="H1961"\w* fuel \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* fire.

\w For|strong="H5704"\w* \w unto|strong="H6213"\w* \w us|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* child \w is|strong="H3068"\w* born, \w unto|strong="H6213"\w* \w us|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* son \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w given|strong="H6213"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w government|strong="H4951"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w His|strong="H3068"\w* shoulders. \w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w He|strong="H5704"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* called Wonderful Counselor, Mighty \w God|strong="H3068"\w*, \w Everlasting|strong="H5769"\w* Father, Prince \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Peace|strong="H7965"\w*.

\w Of|strong="H1697"\w* \w the|strong="H7971"\w* increase \w of|strong="H1697"\w* \w His|strong="H7971"\w* government \w and|strong="H3478"\w* peace \w there|strong="H1697"\w* \w will|strong="H3478"\w* \w be|strong="H1697"\w* \w no|strong="H7971"\w* end. \w He|strong="H7971"\w* \w will|strong="H3478"\w* reign \w on|strong="H5307"\w* \w the|strong="H7971"\w* throne \w of|strong="H1697"\w* \w David|strong="H7971"\w* \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w over|strong="H5307"\w* \w his|strong="H7971"\w* kingdom, \w to|strong="H3478"\w* establish \w and|strong="H3478"\w* sustain \w it|strong="H7971"\w* \w with|strong="H1697"\w* justice \w and|strong="H3478"\w* righteousness \w from|strong="H3478"\w* \w that|strong="H1697"\w* \w time|strong="H3478"\w* \w and|strong="H3478"\w* forevermore. \w The|strong="H7971"\w* zeal \w of|strong="H1697"\w* \w the|strong="H7971"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H1697"\w* Hosts \w will|strong="H3478"\w* \w accomplish|strong="H1697"\w* \w this|strong="H1697"\w*. Judgment against Israel’s Pride

\w The|strong="H3605"\w* Lord \w has|strong="H3045"\w* sent \w a|strong="H3068"\w* message \w against|strong="H3824"\w* Jacob, \w and|strong="H5971"\w* \w it|strong="H3045"\w* \w has|strong="H3045"\w* fallen \w upon|strong="H3427"\w* \w Israel|strong="H5971"\w*.

All \w the|strong="H1129"\w* people \w will|strong="H5307"\w* know \w it|strong="H1129"\w*— Ephraim \f + \fr 9:9 \ft That is, the northern kingdom of Israel\f* \w and|strong="H5307"\w* \w the|strong="H1129"\w* dwellers \w of|strong="H5307"\w* Samaria. \w With|strong="H8256"\w* pride \w and|strong="H5307"\w* arrogance \w of|strong="H5307"\w* heart they \w will|strong="H5307"\w* say:

“\w The|strong="H5921"\w* bricks \w have|strong="H3068"\w* fallen, \w but|strong="H3068"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* rebuild \w with|strong="H3068"\w* finished stone; \w the|strong="H5921"\w* sycamores \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w been|strong="H3068"\w* felled, \w but|strong="H3068"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* replace \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* cedars.”

\w The|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w has|strong="H3478"\w* raised \w up|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* foes \w of|strong="H3027"\w* Rezin \w against|strong="H3027"\w* \w him|strong="H3027"\w* \w and|strong="H3478"\w* joined \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w enemies|strong="H3027"\w* together.

Aram \f + \fr 9:12 \ft That is, Syria\f* \w from|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H5221"\w* east \w and|strong="H3068"\w* Philistia \w from|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H5221"\w* west \w have|strong="H3068"\w* devoured \w Israel|strong="H5971"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* open mouths. Despite \w all|strong="H5704"\w* \w this|strong="H7725"\w*, \w His|strong="H3068"\w* anger \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w turned|strong="H7725"\w* \w away|strong="H7725"\w*; \w His|strong="H3068"\w* hand \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w still|strong="H7725"\w* upraised. Judgment against Israel’s Hypocrisy

\w But|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* people \w did|strong="H3478"\w* not return \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w Him|strong="H3772"\w* \w who|strong="H3068"\w* struck \w them|strong="H3117"\w*; \w they|strong="H3117"\w* \w did|strong="H3478"\w* not seek \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* Hosts.

\w So|strong="H5375"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H1931"\w* cut \w off|strong="H5375"\w* Israel’s \w head|strong="H7218"\w* \w and|strong="H7218"\w* \w tail|strong="H2180"\w*, \w both|strong="H3384"\w* palm branch \w and|strong="H7218"\w* reed \w in|strong="H6440"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* single day.

\w The|strong="H1961"\w* head \w is|strong="H2088"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* elder \w and|strong="H5971"\w* honorable \w man|strong="H2088"\w*, \w and|strong="H5971"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* tail \w is|strong="H2088"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* prophet \w who|strong="H5971"\w* teaches \w lies|strong="H1961"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w those|strong="H3605"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* guide \w this|strong="H2063"\w* \w people|strong="H3808"\w* mislead \w them|strong="H5921"\w*, \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w those|strong="H3605"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* mislead \w are|strong="H3027"\w* swallowed \w up|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w Therefore|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* Lord takes \w no|strong="H1197"\w* pleasure \w in|strong="H1197"\w* \w their|strong="H3588"\w* young men; \w He|strong="H3588"\w* \w has|strong="H3588"\w* \w no|strong="H1197"\w* compassion \w on|strong="H3341"\w* \w their|strong="H3588"\w* fatherless \w and|strong="H8068"\w* widows. \w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w every|strong="H3588"\w* \w one|strong="H3588"\w* \w of|strong="H3293"\w* \w them|strong="H3588"\w* \w is|strong="H3588"\w* godless \w and|strong="H8068"\w* wicked, \w and|strong="H8068"\w* \w every|strong="H3588"\w* mouth speaks folly. Despite all \w this|strong="H3588"\w*, \w His|strong="H3588"\w* anger \w is|strong="H3588"\w* \w not|strong="H3588"\w* turned \w away|strong="H1197"\w*; \w His|strong="H3588"\w* hand \w is|strong="H3588"\w* \w still|strong="H3588"\w* upraised. Judgment against Israel’s Unrepentance

\w For|strong="H3068"\w* wickedness burns \w like|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* fire \w that|strong="H5971"\w* consumes \w the|strong="H3068"\w* thorns \w and|strong="H3068"\w* briers \w and|strong="H3068"\w* kindles \w the|strong="H3068"\w* forest thickets \w which|strong="H3068"\w* roll upward \w in|strong="H3068"\w* billows \w of|strong="H3068"\w* smoke.

\w By|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* wrath \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* Hosts \w the|strong="H5921"\w* land \w is|strong="H1320"\w* scorched, \w and|strong="H1320"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w people|strong="H1320"\w* \w are|strong="H1320"\w* fuel \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* fire. \w No|strong="H3808"\w* \w man|strong="H1320"\w* \w even|strong="H3808"\w* spares \w his|strong="H5921"\w* brother.

\w They|strong="H1992"\w* carve \w out|strong="H5186"\w* \w what|strong="H2063"\w* \w is|strong="H3027"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* right, \w but|strong="H3808"\w* \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w are|strong="H1992"\w* \w still|strong="H5750"\w* hungry; \w they|strong="H1992"\w* eat \w what|strong="H2063"\w* \w is|strong="H3027"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w left|strong="H7725"\w*, \w but|strong="H3808"\w* \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w are|strong="H1992"\w* \w still|strong="H5750"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* satisfied. \w Each|strong="H3605"\w* \w one|strong="H3605"\w* devours \w the|strong="H3605"\w* flesh \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w own|strong="H3027"\w* offspring.\f + \fr 9:20 \ft Literally of his own arm\f*
Manasseh devours Ephraim, and Ephraim Manasseh; together they turn against Judah. Despite all this, His anger is not turned away; His hand is still upraised.
